issue.title: [Rust][ [DataFusion] Integrate query optimizer with ExecutionContext
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4602](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4602). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Integrate the new projection push down query optimizer rule with the query engine so that queries only load referenced columns from disk.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4602?focusedCommentId=16771508) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3678
